events.message: I received the wrong item in my recent order and would like to request a refund as soon as possible.
The case has been categorized under Refund due to the customer's request for returning the wrong product.
Your case has been assigned to one of our refund specialists who will assist you further.
Hello! I’m sorry to hear about the issue with your order. I’ll do my best to help you get this resolved quickly.
Could you please provide your order number and a photo of the item you received so we can verify and start the refund process?
Here is my order number 789456123 and attached is a photo showing the incorrect product I received instead of what I ordered.
Thank you for the details. We will initiate a full refund to your original payment method and provide you with a prepaid return label shortly.
That sounds great, thank you for handling this so quickly. I appreciate the prepaid return label too.
We have processed your refund and emailed the return label to you. Please let us know if you need any further assistance.
Just checking in to ensure you have received the refund and if the return went smoothly. Please feel free to reach out if you have any more questions.
Since there have been no further issues reported, we are closing this support case. Thank you for contacting us.
